io.druid.indexing.overlord

Interface TaskRunner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ForkingTaskRunner, RemoteTaskRunner, ThreadPoolTaskRunner

    public interface TaskRunner
    Interface for handing off tasks. Managed by a TaskQueue.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<? extends TaskRunnerWorkItem> getKnownTasks() 
      Collection<? extends TaskRunnerWorkItem> getPendingTasks() 
      Collection<? extends TaskRunnerWorkItem> getRunningTasks() 
      Collection<ZkWorker> getWorkers() 
      com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<TaskStatus> run(Task task)
      Run a task.
      void shutdown(String taskid)
      Inform the task runner it can clean up any resources associated with a task.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<TaskStatus> run(Task task)
        Run a task. The returned status should be some kind of completed status.
        Parameters:
        task - task to run
        Returns:
        task status, eventually

      • shutdown

        void shutdown(String taskid)
        Inform the task runner it can clean up any resources associated with a task. This implies shutdown of any currently-running tasks.
        Parameters:
        taskid - task ID to clean up resources for
